a.inventory > 0
AND ( b.act_no LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{dto.keyword},'%') or a.goods_id in ( SELECT goods_id from goods_inventory t1 LEFT JOIN goods_size t2 on t1.size_id =t2.id where t2.size like CONCAT( '%', #{dto.keyword},'%') ) )

SELECT c.size, a.* FROM goods_inventory a LEFT JOIN goods_size c on a.size_id = c.id
a.data_status > -1
AND a.id IN
#{item}
AND a.id LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{dto.id},'%')
AND a.goods_id LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{dto.goodsId},'%')
AND a.size_id LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{dto.sizeId},'%')
AND a.inventory >= #{dto.inventoryFrom}
